title: Ep 102: 2019 Reflections and Reframes
itunes:title: Ep 102: 2019 Reflections and Reframes
itunes:subtitle: On this week’s episode Kate shares her Mist List (she loves a mist) and Doree breaks down her best practices for finishing a book with a baby at home. Then they take a look back at 2019, past intentions, life changes, what they learned, and what they’r...
description:
On this week’s episode Kate shares her Mist List (she loves a mist) and Doree breaks down her best practices for finishing a book with a baby at home. Then they take a look back at 2019, past intentions, life changes, what they learned, and what they’re leaving behind.


To leave a voicemail, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:

  • Conair - To buy the InfinitiPRO by Conair Texture Styling Hair Dryer, go to Conair.com and search for Textured Hair.
  • Essie - To learn more about Essie Expressie check out essie.com.
  • Lola - Save 30% on your first subscription when you go to mylola.com and use promo code FOREVER2019.
  • TodayTix - Go to todaytix.com/forever35 for $10 off your first purchase.
  • Joybird - Head to joybird.com/forever35 for 25% off your first order with promo code FOREVER35.
  • Native - For 20% off your first purchase just visit nativedeodorant.com and use promo code FOREVER35 at checkout.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
